1010001001000000 0010110110100100 0 -> sum: 1100111111100100, cout: 0
1011111000000101 0011111010111000 0 -> sum: 1111110010111101, cout: 0
0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0
